p: The only RCT[ 23] in our analysis was low risk in terms of random sequence generation, blinding of participants and personnel, blinding of outcome assessment and incomplete outcome data but had an unclear risk with respect to allocation concealment, selective reporting and other bias ( S2 Fig). The biases of the observational cohort studies, evaluated by the Newcastleâˆ’Ottawa scale, are shown in Table 2. Three studies had seven to eight stars, which indicates very good quality; four studies had five to six stars and are regarded as being of good quality. After reading the clinical trial designs and protocols of the included literature in detail, no reporting biases were found.
